sentence.Network_en: If Blythe heard that piece, I bet he was gnashing his teeth.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果布莱思听到那个消息，我保准他会气得咬牙切齿。

sentence.Network_en: If you couldn't attend either of the concerts and are currently gnashing your teeth at having missed out, don't despair.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果这两场音乐会你都未能参加并且正在为错失机会而懊恼的话，别灰心。

sentence.Network_en: There will be wailing and gnashing of teeth whatever criteria the Arts Council employ for this exercise.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论艺术委员会采取哪种标准来评判这次训练，总会有人哀怨，有人气愤。

list.abs: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .在那里要有哀号和切齿。
To gnash the teeth and stare in anger ., 龇牙瞪眼.
without apples without pork to rupture gnash ., 没有苹果猪肉搅碎.
gnash the teeth and stare in anger ., 龇牙瞪眼.

entry.def: If you say that someone is gnashing their teeth, you mean they are angry or frustrated about something.

example.ex: If Blythe heard that piece, I bet he was gnashing his teeth...
example.tran: 如果布莱思听到那个消息，我保准他会气得咬牙切齿。

example.ex: If you couldn't attend either of the concerts and are currently gnashing your teeth at having missed out, don't despair...
example.tran: 如果这两场音乐会你都未能参加并且正在为错失机会而懊恼的话，别灰心。

auth_sentence.content: Lets not fill pages of your wailing and gnashing of teeth.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lets not fill pages of your wailing and gnashing of teeth.

auth_sentence.content: But judging from all the gnashing of teeth, the No.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But judging from all the gnashing of teeth, the No.

auth_sentence.content: This will surely result in much wailing and gnashing of teeth in Washington.
auth_sentence.res_content: This will surely result in much wailing and gnashing of teeth in Washington.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This will surely result in much wailing and gnashing of teeth in Washington.
